markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Undaunted](/Feats.aspx?ID=1043) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Leshy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=225" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 54 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your spirit has endured many challenges over its long existence, and you are certain you can overcome whatever hardships life throws your way. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60) effects. If you roll a success on a saving throw against an emotion effect, you get a critical success instead.
name: Undaunted
